description: If you work for yourself in business then claiming expenses can affect how much tax you pay. Check out our information guides to find out what allowable expenses you can claim for. Learn more about different types of scheme, such as flat rate expenses, and how to claim for costs incurred by your business, including vehicles, travel, and working from home.
